value.stringValue: Mandatory details needed for Case Status 5 update failed.

decisions.name: Check_for_Null_Related_Case_Records
decisions.label: Check for Null Related Case Records

rules.name: Case_Type_1_0
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7) AND (4 OR 5)) OR (1 AND 8 AND 9)
rules.label: Case Type 1

rules.name: Case_Type_2_0
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7) AND (4 OR 5)) OR (1 AND 8 AND 9)
rules.label: Case Type 2

rules.name: Case_Type_3_0
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9) AND (4 OR 5)
rules.label: Case Type 3

rules.name: Case_Type_4_0
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9) AND (4 OR 5)
rules.label: Case Type 4

rules.name: Case_Type_5_0
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9) AND (4 OR 5)
rules.label: Case Type 5

rules.name: Case_Type_1
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 4 AND 5 AND ((2 AND 3) OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Case Type 1

rules.name: Case_Type_2
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 4 AND 5 AND ((2 AND 3) OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Case Type 2

rules.name: Case_Type_3
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 4 AND 5 AND ((2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7) OR 8 OR 9)
rules.label: Case Type 3

rules.name: Case_Type_4
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 4 AND 5 AND ((2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7) OR 8 OR 9)
rules.label: Case Type 4

rules.name: Case_Type_5
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 4 AND 5 AND ((2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7) OR 8 OR 9)
rules.label: Case Type 5

rules.name: Is_Case_eligible_move_ahead
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 13 AND 14) OR ((3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12 AND 13 AND 14) OR (6 AND 7 AND 9 AND 10 AND 13 AND 14)
rules.label: Is Case eligible move ahead

rules.name: MRR_Is_Case_eligible_move_ahead
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11) OR ((3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11) OR (6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11)
rules.label: MRR-Is Case eligible move ahead
